name: FMTrobot
description:
Drag And Drop objects to assemble the robot.

Use button to get robot parts.

Have fun :)

This game is made for my first gamejam

Game made in just 5 days

Thanks baha for help with PixelArt

Indie Game Jam Begginers #003 - https://itch.io/jam/indie-game-dev-beginners-003
